summary: Completed frontend testing of 'Additional Cameras' feature. All 4 requested features are working correctly: Streams Tab camera CRUD, Scene 1 camera selection, Scene 2 camera dropdown, and Scene 4 camera as main with pilot PiP.
passed_tests: Streams Tab: 'Additional Cameras' section exists with Video icon header - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera Name input field with placeholder 'Finish Line Camera' - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Stream URL input field with placeholder 'https://vdo.ninja/...' - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Add Camera button (orange) - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera card shows with Active toggle (green) - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera card has Edit button (blue pencil icon) - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera card has Delete button (red trash icon) - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera card has video preview area - VERIFIED
Streams Tab: Camera card has audio/video controls (volume, saturation, contrast, brightness) - VERIFIED
Scene 1 (Live Stage): Cameras appear in 'ADDITIONAL CAMERAS' section BEFORE Google Maps and pilots - VERIFIED
Scene 1 (Live Stage): Cameras are checkable and display in main grid with Video icon overlay - VERIFIED
Scene 2 (Timing Tower): Dropdown selector exists in left panel for cameras and pilots - VERIFIED
Scene 2 (Timing Tower): Dropdown shows 'ADDITIONAL CAMERAS' section with camera options - VERIFIED
Scene 2 (Timing Tower): Dropdown shows 'PILOTS' section with pilot options - VERIFIED
Scene 2 (Timing Tower): Selected camera shows with Video icon label in main display - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): 'MAIN CAMERA' selector dropdown exists in left panel - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): Dropdown shows 'None (Use Pilot Stream)' as default option - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): Dropdown shows camera options (Drone Camera, Helicopter Camera) with Video icons - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): When camera selected, pilot stream appears as Picture-in-Picture - VERIFIED
Scene 4 (Pilot Focus): PiP has rounded corners and positioned in bottom-right (not touching sides) - VERIFIED
seed_data_creation: Test data created via localStorage: 1 pilot (Test Driver, #99, with stream URL, Active), 1 SS stage (Test Stage SS1), 2 cameras (Drone Camera, Helicopter Camera, both Active)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 'Additional Cameras' features are working correctly. The Streams Tab has a complete camera CRUD section with form inputs, Add Camera button, and camera cards with Active toggle, Edit/Delete buttons, video preview, and audio/video controls. Scene 1 shows cameras in 'ADDITIONAL CAMERAS' section before Google Maps and pilots. Scene 2 has a dropdown selector with cameras and pilots sections. Scene 4 has a 'MAIN CAMERA' dropdown that when a camera is selected, shows the pilot stream as Picture-in-Picture in the bottom-right corner with rounded corners.

streams_tab_additional_cameras.details: Section exists with Video icon header, Camera Name input (placeholder: 'Finish Line Camera'), Stream URL input (placeholder: 'https://vdo.ninja/...'), Add Camera button. Camera cards show with Active toggle, Edit/Delete buttons, video preview, audio meter, and audio/video controls (volume, saturation, contrast, brightness).

scene_1_camera_selection.details: Cameras appear in 'ADDITIONAL CAMERAS' section in left panel BEFORE Google Maps and pilots. Cameras are checkable with Video icon. Selected cameras display in main grid with Video icon overlay and camera name label.

scene_2_camera_dropdown.details: Dropdown selector in left panel shows 'ADDITIONAL CAMERAS' section with camera options (Video icon) and 'PILOTS' section with pilot options. Selected camera shows with Video icon label in main display area.

scene_4_camera_pip.details: 'MAIN CAMERA' dropdown exists with 'None (Use Pilot Stream)' as default. Camera options show with Video icons. When camera selected, main display shows camera feed with Video icon label, and pilot stream appears as Picture-in-Picture (small, rounded corners, bottom-right, not touching sides).
